persona.name: Justin
persona.activities:
Justin is a young, hip trendsetter who is constantly active and loves using cutting edge technology. He has a lucrative job (a trader in the city) and plenty of spare cash. He's always busy and uses his mobile (and many applications) to schedule his life. his interests are in cars, technology, music and fashion.
Justin commutes frequently and is also a keen runner, cyclist and does plenty of exercise.
persona.attitudes:
For Justin, style is everything. He cares deeply about his appearance and the way his personal effects look. He does not mind spending money on things that look good.
Justin is very busy and constantly multitasking. He uses technology to keep himself up to date and fill in the gaps in his schedule.
He trusts technology and is happy to share data with many people through it.
persona.aptitudes: Justin is cutting edge, constantly buying new gadgets. He is fairly technology savvy, although he does not necessarily know much about the risks he faces online.
persona.motivations:
His motivations are pleasure and style: he cares about appearance and buying things that absolutely meet his specifications.
He also tries to fit a lot of activities into the day in order to keep up with his numerous interests.

persona_environment.name: Identity
persona_environment.narrative: Justin doesn't care much for his own privacy or personal data; he is just happy to get new features and gadgets, and is indifferent about spending money to satiate his whims. Technology is a bit like magic for him, but perhaps he is setting himself up for a catastrophe in the future?

document_reference.name: Fills time wherever possible
document_reference.document: Converging applications within and across devices Story
document_reference.excerpt: As Peter is waiting for his dessert, he picks up a magazine in a different language than his that somebody has forgotten on a shelf. He doesn\'t understand the headers and takes a picture of one of the headers with his phone. The header is automatically translated for him. Peter then stows the magazine away as he spots a very interesting contemporary painting on the wall next to the table. He quickly opens the artist application on his mobile for recognising paintings and photos, and the name and information about the artist is automatically retrieved as he takes a photo of it. He continues to search for more information about the artist in the browser just as the dessert is served to him.

document_reference.name: Constantly listening to music
document_reference.document: Converging applications within and across devices Story
document_reference.excerpt: I use the music daily whilst walking, jogging, biking, and I really would like to continue using them in the car sometimes too

document_reference.name: Wants to customise the style and features of his new car
document_reference.document: Converging applications within and across devices Story
document_reference.excerpt: He likes the style of it and especially that he can travel to Munich to personalise for his individual interior choice, exterior, but also for infotainment, engine, tires, and safety choices.

document_reference.document: Converging applications within and across devices Story
document_reference.excerpt: Peter thinks, not only is he very happy for being able to transfer his music into the car, moreover also to be able to personalise his radio program offer, combined with a new advertisement offering

document_reference.name: Takes 3 days off to buy a car
document_reference.document: Converging applications within and across devices Story
document_reference.excerpt: The following story is about Peter. He is a keen user of new mobile applications and has decided to spend three full days in leisure mode in Munich to further enjoy the planned purchasing of a new car.

document_reference.name: Does not live with family
document_reference.document: Converging applications within and across devices Story
document_reference.excerpt: As he enters the door at home in the evening, he notices that the converged application on his mobile suggests to continue playing the same music he listened to in the car when he switched off the engine in the garage. Wow, his new pink metallic car with beige leather seats, is indeed his favourite pet by now; He immediately calls his friend Fiona over to find out if her mobile also can connect to his new converged infotainment package too!

document_reference.name: Uses and contributes to online social networks
document_reference.document: Converging applications within and across devices Story
document_reference.excerpt: Peter decides to buy the product with the best [online] review....He selects Recommend in the application and the recommendation is published to his friends.....Peter therefore adds a recommendation entry for the restaurant in the restaurant guide whilst eating dinner that becomes instantly visible for other people using the guide.

document_reference.name: Shares personal data with BMW
document_reference.document: Converging applications within and across devices Story
document_reference.excerpt: The adviser asks Peter to touch his phone onto a tablet with a larger screen. Peter does so and his name, contacts, and appointment appears automatically on the bigger tablet screen.

document_reference.name: Uses mobile phone for complex tasks
document_reference.document: Converging applications within and across devices Story
document_reference.excerpt: Some of his mobile applications are woven together and interplay already.....Peter pays by waving his mobile and the chosen product on the shop counter.....the calendar on his phone reminds his about his appointment for BMW car customisation......He has planned for next day to walk to the BMW museum with the help of the mobile navigation software on his phone.....A confirmation of order automatically appears in his inbox on the mobile. It tells him where he can pick up the car keys tomorrow at 12:30......He is told to pair the electronic car key with his mobile and he willingly does so.....Peter says as he holds up his mobile towards the customer consultant to clearly signal that he wants to pay.
